We will be open for the 4th of july Located in South Windermere off of Folly Road. Three Little Birds Café & Catering serves Breakfast and Lunch all day. Three Little Birds Café opened in August 2007. We serve a large breakfast, with pancakes, french toast, omelets, and benedicts. Our lunch features sandwiches, wraps, and huge fresh salads. We freshly squeeze all of our juices and have a large variety of handmade smoothies. Fly on over and check us out, we have indoor and outside seating and carry out. Phone (843) 225-3065 Location 65 Windermere Blvd. Charleston, SC 29414 Hours 7:30a–2p 8a–2p M-F Sa-Su Cart () 0
